column6:
Can Matt Murdock balance the scales of justice and save his wife? Can Daredevil bring peace to the streets of Hell's Kitchen, which are caught in a super-powered gang war? And what is the terrible secret Mr. Fear is hiding? By Brubaker and Lark.,2008,1
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Stefano Gaudiano | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | artist:Michael Lark
